entry.title: Sabbath: Experiencing and Living the Character of God - Lesson 12 Q4 2020

media:group.media:title: Sabbath: Experiencing and Living the Character of God - Lesson 12 Q4 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 4, lesson 12 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is “Education” and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “Sabbath: Experiencing and Living the Character of God”. Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
Reading: Genesis 1, 2, Exod. 16:14–29, Isa. 58:1–14, Matt. 12:1–13, Luke 13:10–17.
Memory Text: “And He said to them, ‘The Sabbath was made for man, and not man for the Sabbath. Therefore the Son of Man is also Lord of the Sabbath’ ” (Mark 2:27, 28, NKJV).
December 12–December 18
Sunday (Shelley Quinn) - “Time to Be Astonished” Monday (John Lomacang) - “Time for Rediscovery” Tuesday (Ryan Day) - “Time for Learning Priorities” Wednesday (Jill Morikone) - “Time for Finding Balance” Thursday (John Dinzey) - “A Time for Community
🔴ONLINE SABBATH SCHOOL LESSON PDF https://absg.adventist.org/pdf.php?file=2020:4Q:SE:PDFs:EAQ420_12.pdf
🔗SABBATH SCHOOL PANEL WEBSITE: https://3abnsabbathschoolpanel.com/
🔗SABBATH SCHOOL PANEL PODCAST: https://3abn.org/ssp-podcast.html

entry.title: Why You Need the Faith of Jesus | Sermon by John Lomacang

media:group.media:title: Why You Need the Faith of Jesus | Sermon by John Lomacang
media:group.media:description:
Sermon by John Lomacang produced by 3ABN. The day of God is approaching and our faith as Christians will continue to be challenged. Those who keep the commandments of God and have the faith of Jesus will stand during the last days of earths history.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.

entry.title: 3ABN Today Cooking - "Recipes for Special Occasions" with Stephanie Salazar (TDYC190009)

media:group.media:title: 3ABN Today Cooking - "Recipes for Special Occasions" with Stephanie Salazar (TDYC190009)
media:group.media:description:
Join host Idalia Dinzey and guest Stephanie Salazar as she prepares some special yummy food you and your family are sure to enjoy! Recipes include: Marvelous Butter, "Cheesecake", Festive Vegetable Bake, Roasted Gluten, and Festive Punch.
Find full recipes here: https://bit.ly/36UDMt1

entry.title: The Christian and Work | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 11 Q4 2020

media:group.media:title: The Christian and Work | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 11 Q4 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 4, lesson 11 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is “Education” and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “The Christian and Work”. Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
Reading: Gen. 3:19, Deut. 16:15, Exod. 25:10–30:38, Gal. 5:22–26, Eccles. 9:10, 1 Cor. 10:31
Memory Text: “Therefore, my beloved brethren, be steadfast, immovable, always abounding in the work of the Lord, knowing that your labor is not in vain in the Lord” (1 Corinthians 15:58, NKJV).
December 5–December 11
Sunday (John Lomacang) - “The Many Sides of Work” Monday (John Dinzey) - “Work and Nurture” Tuesday (Shelley Quinn) - “Work and Excellence” Wednesday (Jill Morikone) - “Work and Spirituality” Thursday (Ryan Day) - “Work and Stewardship”
🔴ONLINE SABBATH SCHOOL LESSON PDF https://absg.adventist.org/pdf.php?file=2020:4Q:SE:PDFs:EAQ420_11.pdf
🔗SABBATH SCHOOL PANEL WEBSITE: https://3abnsabbathschoolpanel.com/
